title: 【求助】1.14的牌子指令问题
author: Clidyeward
txt_content:
最近想做个告示牌传送的，结果发现1.12的指令不能用了，稍微变通了一下才成功召唤了牌子，文字是显示了，但是右击却没反应，求大佬详解。
指令附上
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:oak_sign{Text1:"{"text":"传送主城","color":"red","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":" trigger lobby set 1"}}"}复制代码

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
你的命令我没召唤牌子
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:oak_sign{Text1:'{"text":"传送主城","color":"red","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"say 1"}}'}
我改成这样即可召唤 (并成功say 1
然后你给的value开头有一个空格
试试这样？
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:oak_sign{Text1:'{"text":"传送主城","color":"red","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"trigger lobby set 1"}}'}
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:oak_sign{Text1:'{"text":"传送主城","color":"red","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"trigger lobby set 1"}}'}复制代码

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
\ 全丢掉了，论坛的原因。

/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:oak_sign{Text1:"{\"text\":\"传送主城\",\"color\":\"red\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/say a\"}}"}

前述指定的action使用到的URL地址、文件、聊天内容、命令或书页。注意，命令之前一定要加上“/”斜杠。
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.c ... N.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC

replies.author: Clidyeward
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-20 11:17

/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:oak_sign{Text1:'{"text":"传送主城","color":"red","cl ...
这个有用了，谢谢
